Despite intense physical trauma from a vehicle crash, pinned in the wreck and screaming, he is rescued by another survivor showing resilience under duress.

Relaxes slowly after a tense moment, but keeps finger on the trigger with white-knuckled pressure, then deliberately disables the safety and starts the car, showing controlled readiness and technical know-how.
Hunches down in shadow watching Sarah, then puts the car in gear and follows her receding tail-light.
Leans against the wall watching Sarah with an impassive, confident gaze and does not reveal himself unnecessarily, maintaining a low profile.
Remains motionless and unhurried, suggesting patience and control.
Does not engage or alarm Sarah directly, indicating an awareness of timing and approach.
